turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Susan. Will you order me some coffee for pick up from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Definitely, what do you want from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just a normal plain cappuccino?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I think I want two shots of Espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A venti and two extra shots of espresso? Late night tonight?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. Just driving down South to my parents house.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's right. Are you wanting to pick up your coffee on the way?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That would be great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any particular location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think there's on right off the highway in Arnold, Mo. Order it there and send me the address.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is it the one inside Target in Arnold, Mo, or the one in Arnold Crossroads?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Arnold Crossroads.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Looks like that's about 12 minutes from you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you have them have it ready a half an hour from now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can. Anything else? Food?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. That's a venti cappuccino with two extra shots of espresso ready in a half an hour at 3884 State Route 141 Arnold, MO 63010. Total is going to be $6.56.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks Susan! You're awesome!
